backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles and service request types with access‑controlled CRUD operations and status/notes management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions configuring light/dark mode colors and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting favicon and Open Graph assets and loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring routes, layout, theme provider, and admin guards using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/admin/NotesPanel: Manages viewing and adding public and internal notes for a request, including form inputs and note lists.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with login and home navigation options depending on user authentication state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin-only routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing loaders or denial screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout functionality with loading states based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts newly authenticated users to create a profile, collecting name and optional email before continuing.
frontend/src/components/BrandCard.tsx: Styled card component providing consistent border, background, and shadow for section content.
frontend/src/components/FormField.tsx: Reusable form field wrapper handling labels, helper text, required markers, and error messages.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Pricing section rendering categorized service lists with prices using BrandCard and service catalog utilities.
frontend/src/components/RequestStatusTim: Displays a chronological timeline of request status changes with timestamps and highlights the current status.
frontend/src/components/ServiceSelection: Renders grouped selectable services with checkboxes and pricing, allowing users to toggle selected services.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Shows a multi-column site footer with links, service info, and branding details including a dynamic year and referral link.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides the main navigation header with login, admin links, a mobile menu, and smooth scrolling to the pricing section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientSideReferenc: Manages a list of locally stored reference images with add, remove, and clear helpers using object URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout helpers, and persisted identity loading via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend service‑request operations with React Query for creating, fetching, and updating service requests and notes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports app‑wide branding constants such as name, subtitle, and title.
frontend/src/lib/servicesCatalog.ts: Defines the service catalog with pricing and helpers for filtering, formatting prices, and calculating totals.
frontend/src/lib/statusUtils.ts: Maps request statuses to display labels and UI variants.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind‑merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRequestDet: Admin page showing full request details with controls to update status and price estimates, plus notes and timeline.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRequestsPa: Admin overview table listing all service requests with filtering by status and links to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with hero content, services preview, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceRequestConfirm: Shows a confirmation screen after submitting a service request, displaying the request ID and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceRequestPage.ts: Form page for users to submit service requests, manage selected services, validate inputs, upload images, and send data to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/StatusLookupPage.tsx: Provides a search form to look up a service request by ID and displays its details and status timeline.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, containers, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Holds the project’s current state, including schema version, feature lists, image asset requirements, and an in-progress request to replace and resize the app logo. Describes existing features for generating and applying updated logo assets across the UI and HTML head.
